name: Spy Guy Saves the World: A Horse Game 2D
name_original: Spy Guy Saves the World: A Horse Game 2D
description:
You are spy. Your wife get stolen. You must kill horse. Or die trying. Mess with the best die like the rest. Among us? This is War. War never changes..

Warning: Audio might be loud. Turn it down a bit.  Spaghetti code and terrible code smell. You have been warned.

Afraid to download? Decompile using dnSpy or use Virtual Box
